name: The Huntsman
description:
Gameplay:

Hack and slash your way through either story mode or survival. Fight through levels and their bosses in story mode or endless hordes of enemies in survival mode.


Weapons:

Choose between the fast hitting short sword and the halberd of destruction when dealing with hordes of enemies.

Swift Short Sword:
  • Short Weapon Delay
  • Wide Hit Range
  • Great Against Swarms of Enemies
Halberd of Destruction:
  • High Damage
  • Long Attack Reach
  • Knockback Enemies
  • Extremely Satisfying Kill Knockback

Swap between weapons by pressing 2. Swing the weapon by pressing 1. The UI has an icon that shows which weapon you are using and displays the cooldown period of the weapon if swung.


Enemies:

Fight against multitudes of enemies including the Giant Werewolf-King and waves of speedy vampire bats. Werewolves are sturdy enemies that chase and bite the player. Vampire bats are weaker and faster flyer that explode into a cloud of blood when struck by your weapons. The red colored variant enemies are stronger and take more hits to kill.


Powerups

There are three powerups in the game. The powerups can temporarily increase your damage or speed or permanently restore health. Decide when and how to use the randomly spawned powerups to best suit your needs.
